olac:olac.dc:title: Prague Arabic Dependency Treebank 1.0
olac:olac.dc:creator: Hajič, Jan
Smrž, Otakar
Zemánek, Petr
Pajas, Petr
Šnaidauf, Jan
Beška, Emanuel
Kracmar, Jakub
Hassanová, Kamila
olac:olac.dc:description: The PADT project might be summarized as an open-ended activity of the Center for Computational Linguistics, the Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics, and the Institute of Comparative Linguistics, Charles University in Prague, resting in multi-level annotation of Arabic language resources in the light of the theory of Functional Generative Description (Sgall et al., 1986; Hajičová and Sgall, 2003).
olac:olac.dc:publisher: Charles University, Faculty of Mathematics and Physics, Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics (UFAL)
olac:olac.dc:subject: corpus
Arabic
